document_data.name: Raor Dynasty
document_data.mainbody: The '''Raor Dynasty''' was the first of the four dynasties of the [[Third Age of Calimshan]].
document_data.Organization: Like the dynasties of the previous age, the Raors ruled as [[bakkal]] [[priests]] over Calimshan.
document_data.Base of Operations: The seat of power of the Raor bakkals was located in the city of [[Calimport]].
document_data.Activities: The Raor Dynasty saw the empire of Calimshan expand to include Calimshan proper, [[Tethyr]], [[Iltkazar (disambiguation)|Iltkazar]], and [[Mir]], stretching as far north as the [[Snowflake Mountains]].
document_data.History:
Little is remembered about the Raor Dynasty, beyond the fact that it ushered in Calimshan's Third Age and the greatest extent of its empire. The dynasty was founded in {{Yearlink|-1900}}.

During the Raor dynasty, the [[Caltazar Hills]] became a place of constant conflict with the [[Alimir Hive]] of [[beholder]]s, which would escalate for many centuries.

The dynasty's short time was brought to a swift end in {{Yearlink|-1838}} by the [[Red dragon|red]] [[wyrm]] [[Ylveraasahlisar]] the Rose Dragon. Calishite [[adventurer]]s had killed one of her offspring in a raid of her horde. In revenge, she attacked the city of Calimport, destroying nearly two-thirds of the city, including the [[Caleph's Court]]. The army was decimated before her wrath, and the bakkal was slain. Ylveraasahlisar took the throne of the empire for herself and reigned for over a century.
